Title: Relates to workers' access to treatment
Summary: Allows for treatment costing less than $1,500 to be done without prior approval, and more clearly defines the list of "pre-authorized procedures" as a floor on treatment as opposed to its current status as a ceiling; allows non-network providers of testing to be compensated at the provider network rate negotiated by the carrier.
LawCode: Amd ยง13-a, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to workers' access to treatment
